text: Soretomo kare-ra wa,`kare (muhanmado) wa arra ni tsuite uso o detchiageta.' To iu no ka. Arra ga o nozominaraba, anata no kokoro o fujiru koto mo dekiru. Mata arra wa, sono o kotoba ni yotte kyogi o keshi, shinri o uchitateru koto mo dekiru. Hontoni kare wa mune no naka ni daku koto o shiri tsukusa reru
